Summary: Awesome Crisps!!! Arrived in just 8 days in Texas from England!!!!
Text:
These crisps are my favorite. I ordered these expecting to get them in a month or two, and to my surprise they arrived in just 8 days!!!
I immediately ordered 8 more 6 packs, as my entire family wants these crisps.
Fantastic company I ordered from. I am more than pleased!!!!Walkers Worcester Sauce Crisps 6 Pack 150g
